initializing this contract","underlyingAsset":"The address of the underlying asset of this aToken (E.g. WETH for aWETH)"}},"mint(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Passing both the unscaled and scaled amounts enhances precision. The `scaledAmount` is used for precise balance updates, while the `amount` is used for allowance checks, preventing cumulative rounding errors.","params":{"amount":"The unscaled amount of debt to be accounted for allowance","index":"The variable debt index of the reserve","onBehalfOf":"The address receiving the debt tokens","scaledAmount":"The scaled amount of debt tokens to mint","user":"The address receiving the borrowed underlying, being the delegatee in case of credit delegate, or same as `onBehalfOf` otherwise"},"returns":{"_0":"The scaled total debt of the reserve"}},"nonces(address)":{"params":{"owner":"The address for which the nonce is being returned"},"returns":{"_0":"The nonce value for the input address`"}},"scaledBalanceOf(address)":{"details":"The scaled balance is the sum of all the updated stored balance divided by the reserve's liquidity index at the moment of the update","params":{"user":"The user whose balance is calculated"},"returns":{"_0":"The scaled balance of the user"}},"scaledTotalSupply()":{"returns":{"_0":"The scaled total supply"}},"totalSupply()":{"details":"Returns the amount of tokens in existence."},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"Being non transferrable, the debt token does not implement any of the standard ERC20 functions for transfer and allowance."}},"title":"VariableDebtToken","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"DOMAIN_SEPARATOR()":{"notice":"Get the domain separator for the token"},"REWARDS_CONTROLLER()":{"notice":"Returns the address of the Incentives Controller contract"},"UNDERLYING_ASSET_ADDRESS()":{"notice":"Returns the address of the underlying asset of this debtToken (E.g. WETH for variableDebtWETH)"},"approveDelegation(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Delegates borrowing power to a user on the specific debt token. Delegation will still respect the liquidation constraints (even if delegated, a delegatee cannot force a delegator HF to go below 1)"},"borrowAllowance(address,address)":{"notice":"Returns the borrow allowance of the user"},"burn(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Burns user variable debt."},"delegationWithSig(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"Delegates borrowing power to a user on the specific debt token via ERC712 signature"},"getIncentivesController()":{"notice":"Returns the address of the Incentives Controller contract"},"getPreviousIndex(address)":{"notice":"Returns last index interest was accrued to the user's balance"},"getScaledUserBalanceAndSupply(address)":{"notice":"Returns the scaled balance of the user and the scaled total supply."},"initialize(address,address,uint8,string,string,bytes)":{"notice":"Initializes the debt token."},"mint(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Mints debt token to the `onBehalfOf` address."},"nonces(address)":{"notice":"Returns the nonce value for address specified as parameter"},"scaledBalanceOf(address)":{"notice":"Returns the scaled balance of the user."},"scaledTotalSupply()":{"notice":"Returns the scaled total supply of the scaled balance token. DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().details: Return cached value if chainId matches cache, otherwise recomputes separator

returns._0: The domain separator of the token at current chain
The address of the underlying asset

params.delegatee: The address receiving the delegated borrowing power

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.

params.toUser: The user to give allowance to

burn(address,uint256,uint256).details: Passing the scaled amount allows for more precise calculations and avoids cumulative errors from repeated conversions.In some instances, a burn transaction will emit a mint event if the amount to burn is less than the interest that the user accrued.

params.from: The address from which the debt will be burned
params.index: The variable debt index of the reserve
params.scaledAmount: The scaled amount of debt getting burned

returns._0: True if the new balance is zero
returns._1: The scaled total debt of the reserve

params.pool: The address of the Pool contract
params.rewardsController: The address of the rewards controller contract

params.deadline: The deadline timestamp, type(uint256).max for max deadline
params.delegatee: The delegatee that can use the credit

returns._0: The address of the Incentives Controller
The last index interest was accrued to the user's balance, expressed in ray
The scaled balance of the user

params.debtTokenDecimals: The decimals of the debtToken, same as the underlying asset's
params.params: A set of encoded parameters for additional initialization
params.pool: The pool contract that is initializing this contract
params.underlyingAsset: The address of the underlying asset of this aToken (E.g. WETH for aWETH)

mint(address,address,uint256,uint256,uin.details: Passing both the unscaled and scaled amounts enhances precision. The `scaledAmount` is used for precise balance updates, while the `amount` is used for allowance checks, preventing cumulative rounding errors.

params.amount: The unscaled amount of debt to be accounted for allowance
params.index: The variable debt index of the reserve
params.onBehalfOf: The address receiving the debt tokens
params.scaledAmount: The scaled amount of debt tokens to mint
params.user: The address receiving the borrowed underlying, being the delegatee in case of credit delegate, or same as `onBehalfOf` otherwise

returns._0: The scaled total debt of the reserve

params.owner: The address for which the nonce is being returned

returns._0: The nonce value for the input address`

scaledBalanceOf(address).details: The scaled balance is the sum of all the updated stored balance divided by the reserve's liquidity index at the moment of the update

params.user: The user whose balance is calculated

returns._0: The scaled balance of the user

totalSupply().details: Returns the amount of tokens in existence.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Being non transferrable, the debt token does not implement any of the standard ERC20 functions for transfer and allowance.

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().notice: Get the domain separator for the token

REWARDS_CONTROLLER().notice: Returns the address of the Incentives Controller contract

UNDERLYING_ASSET_ADDRESS().notice: Returns the address of the underlying asset of this debtToken (E.g. WETH for variableDebtWETH)

approveDelegation(address,uint256).notice: Delegates borrowing power to a user on the specific debt token. Delegation will still respect the liquidation constraints (even if delegated, a delegatee cannot force a delegator HF to go below 1)

borrowAllowance(address,address).notice: Returns the borrow allowance of the user

delegationWithSig(address,address,uint25.notice: Delegates borrowing power to a user on the specific debt token via ERC712 signature

getIncentivesController().notice: Returns the address of the Incentives Controller contract

getPreviousIndex(address).notice: Returns last index interest was accrued to the user's balance

getScaledUserBalanceAndSupply(address).notice: Returns the scaled balance of the user and the scaled total supply.

mint(address,address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Mints debt token to the `onBehalfOf` address.

nonces(address).notice: Returns the nonce value for address specified as parameter

scaledBalanceOf(address).notice: Returns the scaled balance of the user.

scaledTotalSupply().notice: Returns the scaled total supply of the scaled balance token. Represents sum(debt/index)
